sys_documentation.label: Does the project include a facility for Data Subjects to exercise their privacy

sys_documentation.hint: (refers to the Project or Entity's methods / channels / touchpoints on how Data Subjects are enabled to exercise their rights. It can be as simple as enabling an email to the DPO, or an online form in a website or mobile application.)
